summary: The diff implements both REQ-140 (React infinite loop fix) and REQ-141 (hardcoded backend response). REQ-140 is partially addressed through polling interval adjustments in useQueries.ts. REQ-141 appears implemented in backend/main.mo but the diff is truncated, preventing full verification of the exact function body.

missing_requirements.requirement: Move all state setter calls from render body to explicit event handlers or useEffect with proper dependency arrays in App.tsx
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include App.tsx changes. Only useQueries.ts shows polling interval adjustments (reduced from 500ms to 3000ms), which addresses symptoms but not the root cause of state setters in render body.

hallucinated_features.description: Added staleTime configuration to React Query hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest and requirements do not mention staleTime configuration. Only reduced polling intervals and proper dependency arrays were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added comments about preventing infinite loops in useQueries.ts
hallucinated_features.reason: Comments like 'Reduced polling frequency to prevent infinite loop' and 'Consider data fresh for 2/3 seconds' were added without being requested in the BuildRequest.
